Date format should contain a year part: "yy" or "yyyy"

Date format should contain a day part: "dd"
Date format should contain a 2-symbols day part: "dd"
Time format should contain a hour part: "hh"
The hour part in a time format should be 2 symbols long: "hh"
Time format should contain a minutes part: "ii"
Time format should contain a 2-symbols minutes part: "ii"
Time format should contain a seconds part: "ss"
